org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization

Class JsonSerdes<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization.JsonSerdes<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the object to be serialized/deserialized
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, Serdes<T>, Serializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonObjectSerdes, JsonValueSerdes

    public abstract class JsonSerdes<T>
extends Object
implements Serdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert
